item.title: 欧洲企业四年来最担心外汇波动
item.description: 欧洲公司是四年来最担心货币波动影响的国家，2025 年欧元的强势影响了盈利前景。【原文：European companies are the most worried about the impact of currency fluctuations in four years, with the euro’s strength in 2025 eating into earnings outlooks.】

item.title: 收益率上升，全球资金回流印度主权债务
item.description: 由于相对较高的收益率和较为便宜的卢比提高了当地债务的吸引力，外国投资者转而小幅买入印度主权债券，结束了三个月的连续抛售。【原文：Foreign investors turned modest buyers of Indian sovereign bonds, ending a three-month selling streak, as relatively higher yields and a cheaper rupee improved the appeal of local debt.】

item.title: 印度证券交易委员会计划扩大大型 IPO 的机构配额
item.description: 印度证券监管机构建议对大型首次公开募股进行修改，在新股上市激增的情况下，建议增加机构买家的股份，减少散户投资者的股份。【原文：India’s securities regulator has proposed changes to large initial public offerings, suggesting more shares for institutional buyers and fewer for retail investors amid a surge in new listings.】

item.title: 关税冲击令股市反弹，GPIF 实现 680 亿美元收益
item.description: 随着全球和国内股市从美国关税引发的大跌中强劲回升，日本政府养老金投资基金在截至 6 月的三个月内实现了收益。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund posted a gain in the three months ended in June as global and domestic stock markets recovered strongly from a selloff triggered by US tariffs.】

item.title: 尽管开局火爆，任天堂仍维持 Switch 2 预测不变
item.description: 任天堂公司（Nintendo Co., Ltd.）的 Switch 2 游戏机在开售的头 26 天里售出了 582 万台，但其全年业绩预期保持不变。【原文：Nintendo Co. sold 5.82 million units of its Switch 2 console over its first 26 days on sale, but kept its full-year forecast unchanged.】

item.title: SAP 收购旧金山人力资源软件公司 SmartRecruiters
item.description: 欧洲最有价值的公司 SAP SE 将收购位于旧金山的人力资源软件专业公司 SmartRecruiters。【原文：SAP SE, Europe’s most valuable company, will buy San Francisco-based human resources software specialist SmartRecruiters.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局称，英国 7 月房价反弹，涨幅为 0.6
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，英国房价在 7 月份反弹，这表明在 4 月份增税令潜在购房者望而却步之后，需求正在恢复。【原文：UK house prices bounced back in July in a sign demand is recovering after a tax increase in April discouraged prospective homebuyers, according to one of Britain’s largest mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 炼油厂寻求转向，装载俄罗斯石油的油轮在印度附近海域闲置
item.description: 至少有四艘满载俄罗斯原油的油轮正在印度西海岸附近等待，因为在美国和欧盟的压力下，这个亚洲国家对俄罗斯原油的采购受到了关注。【原文：At least four oil tankers laden with Russian crude are waiting off India’s western coast, as the Asian country’s purchases of the commodity come under the spotlight amid pressure from the US and European Union.】

item.title: 成为英伟达（Nvidia）供应商后，中国的创毅视讯（InnoScience）股价上涨 64
item.description: 中国芯片制造商苏州创毅讯联科技股份有限公司（InnoScience Suzhou Technology Holding Co.【原文：Chinese chipmaker InnoScience Suzhou Technology Holding Co. surged as much as 64% in Hong Kong on Friday after it was identified by Nvidia Corp. as a supplier.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：特朗普开征关税，股市将下跌
WeRide 承诺加大投入，将 Robotaxis 带到世界各地
item.description: 中国自动驾驶汽车公司 WeRide Inc. 计划在继续亏损的情况下增加支出，因为该公司押注其雄心勃勃的国际扩张计划最终将使其实现盈利。【原文：WeRide Inc. plans to ramp up spending, even as it continues to post losses, as the Chinese autonomous driving company bets that its ambitious international expansion plans will eventually see it reach profitability.】

item.title: 特朗普对逃避关税行为的 40% 惩罚仍缺少关键细节
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对华盛顿认定通过其他国家 "转运 "的任何产品征收 40% 的额外关税，这一惩罚旨在阻止主要来自中国的商品逃避美国关税。【原文：President Donald Trump has threatened to pile an additional 40% tariff on any product that Washington determines to be “transshipped” through another country, a punishment aimed at stopping goods mainly from China dodging US duties.】

item.title: 中国部署食人蚊以应对基孔肯雅热的肆虐
item.description: 科学家们正在释放成群的巨型食人蚊，它们的幼虫会吞食传播这种使人衰弱的疾病的小昆虫，从而与中国最大规模的基孔肯雅疫情作斗争。【原文：Scientists battling China’s largest chikungunya epidemic are releasing swarms of giant cannibal mosquitoes whose larvae devour the smaller insects spreading the debilitating disease.】

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入再创新高
item.description: 澳门 7 月份博彩收入增长 19%，连续第四个月超过分析师预期，因为豪赌客的消费欲望不断增强，为这个全球最大博彩中心的复苏注入了新动力。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue rose 19% in July, exceeding analyst expectation for the fourth consecutive month as big bettors’ increasing appetite in spending injects new momentum for recovery in the world’s biggest gambling hub.】

item.title: 特朗普为老挝、缅甸和叙利亚保留最严厉的关税税率
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周四公布了修订后的全球关税计划，对老挝和缅甸征收 40% 的进口关税。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s revised global tariff plan unveiled Thursday hit Laos and Myanmar hard with a 40% import duty — the second-highest rate in the world behind only Syria at 41%.】

item.title: 人民币创六个月来最差一周，成为中国人民银行汇率调整的焦点
item.description: 随着美元反弹，人民币正逼近六个多月来的最大单周跌幅，这使人们更加关注中国央行的政策信号。【原文：The yuan is closing in on its biggest weekly drop in over six months as the dollar rebounds, sharpening the focus on the Chinese central bank’s policy signals.】

item.description: 熟悉情况的人士透露，星巴克公司已将包括私募股权投资公司和科技公司在内的十几家机构列入第二轮投资中国业务的候选名单。【原文：Starbucks Corp. has shortlisted about a dozen parties including private equity firms and technology companies into the second round of a process to invest in its China business, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 世界重量级小麦出口寥寥无几
item.description: 包括俄罗斯、乌克兰和欧盟在内的主要小麦发货国在新季开局缓慢，因为恶劣天气和农民囤积库存抑制了出口。【原文：Top wheat shippers, including Russia, Ukraine and the European Union, got off to a slow start to the new season as exports were curbed by adverse weather and stockpiling by farmers.】

item.title: 空调制造商奥克斯据称计划 9 月在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大的空调制造商之一奥克斯电器有限公司正计划最早于 9 月在香港上市，融资额可能达到 6 亿至 8 亿美元。【原文：Aux Electric Co., one of China’s top makers of air conditioners, is targeting to go public in Hong Kong as early as September in a listing that could raise $600 million to $800 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国政府发出警告后，阿里巴巴和美团誓言停止价格战
item.description: 美团和阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司周五誓言遏制 "无序竞争"，停止以价格为基础的竞争，这种竞争已威胁到利润率，并引发了政府机构的警告。【原文：Meituan and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. vowed Friday to curb “disorderly competition” and cease the price-based rivalry that’s threatened to pressure margins and prompted warnings from government agencies.】

item.title: 中国称美国利用微软旧漏洞发动网络攻击
item.description: 中国指责美国利用微软公司电子邮件服务器的漏洞窃取军事数据，并对中国国防部门发动网络攻击。【原文：China accused the US of exploiting a flaw in Microsoft Corp.’s email servers to steal military data and launch cyberattacks on its defense sector.】

item.title: 日本寻求削减汽车关税，确保汽车制造商的竞争力
item.description: 日本首席贸易谈判代表表示，日本将继续向美国施压，要求美国按照贸易协议中的承诺，将汽车和汽车零部件的关税削减至 15%，并努力确保日本的汽车制造商在与竞争对手的竞争中保持竞争力。【原文：Japan will keep pressing the US to cut tariffs on cars and auto parts to 15% as promised in a trade deal and work to ensure the nation’s automakers remain competitive against their rivals, according to the nation’s chief trade negotiator.】

item.title: 日本加藤对日元创三月以来最弱表示担忧
item.description: 日本财务大臣表示，他对日元的走势感到担忧，在日本央行发出鸽派利率信息后，日元已贬值到 3 月份的水平。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister said he’s worried by movements in the yen, which weakened to levels last seen in March following dovish messaging on interest rates from the Bank of Japan.】

item.title: 柬埔寨将在美国贸易协议中取消关税，购买波音喷气机
item.description: 柬埔寨副首相孙占托（Sun Chanthol）表示，柬埔寨将取消对美国商品征收的关税，并承诺购买多达 20 架波音公司的 737 Max 喷气机，以缩小与华盛顿的贸易差距。【原文：Cambodia will scrap tariffs on US goods and pledged to buy as many as 20 Boeing Co. 737 Max jets in a bid to narrow its trade gap with Washington, according to Deputy Prime Minister Sun Chanthol.】
